short_description: This function cleans up the characteristics values table.
long_description: This function cleans up the characteristics values table. It parses the combination column, removes extra whitespaces, and re-concatenate them using space as delimiter. It also ensures that the elements in the combination are sorted.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.
input_tables.description: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.

argument_clauses.name: CombinationColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the combinations.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the combinations.

argument_clauses.name: ValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the assigned value of each combination.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the assigned value of each combination.

argument_clauses.name: Delimiter
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the character that separates player numbers in combinations—either ' ' (space, the default), '#', '$', '%', or '&'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the character that separates player numbers in combinations—either ' ' (space, the default), '#', '$', '%', or '&'.
